full_sentence: To me, it seems that the jew orders the hit, and the nig nogs are the hitmen.
Ladies, why is my dick not sucked yet?
if you say I hate lesbians you are a clever man

imagine having in your guts for 9 months an abomination. Imagine a foreign body, a worm. There is no wonder, then, that nature piggy-backed on the feeling of disgust to steer women away from incest, i.e. away from relatives, from familiars, from those that provide for her. The lump of nerves and tissue that is known as

has been hard-wired to be disgusted of familiar providers. What is more, it is also hard-wired to take advantage of them. Because, if they can submit her to that ultimate insult, i.e. impregnate her with a monster, what behavior can match that insult? Oh, she'd better get everything she can, while she can, out of him, to make up for the possible damage - and to gain, if possible.  The whole female existence is defined by those, ...well, existential issues.

Political correctness is best mechanism for control, because you can have someone sacked for just about everything while looking justified.  Best way to fight back is to abuse it no end and file anonymous complaints against black promoters, it won't get them in trouble right away but people's psychology can easily be broken and abused. And don't think black promoters have no enemies amongst themselves, inflammatory anonymous complaints will be taken up by the enemy of the promoter (who are likely promoters themselves) and weaponized.
